full_text: Knitted jumper in DROPS Melody. The piece is worked top down in stocking stitch, with round yoke. Sizes XS - XXXL. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #tidesongsweater DROPS Design: Pattern ml-127 Yarn group A + A + A SIZES : XS - S - M - L - XL - XXL - XXXL YARN : DROPS MELODY from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group D) 250-250-300-300-350-400-400 g colour 09, Light Sea Green NEEDLES : DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 5.5 MM: Length 40 cm and 80 cm. DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 4 MM: Length 40 cm and 80 cm. DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 5.5 MM. The technique MAGIC LOOP can be used – you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size. KNITTING TENSION : 15 stitches in width and 19 rows in height, with stocking stitch on needle size 5.5 mm = 10 x 10 cm. NOTE: Needle size is only a guide. If you get too many stitches on 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. If you get too few stitches on 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
name: Ravelry: 263-24 Tide Song Sweater pattern by DROPS design
